participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and tech-savvy, enjoys outdoor activities and gaming.
participant_1.background: Before I die, I want to skydive. I have a pet snake. My dream is to move to the middle of the desert. I start an internship in engineering later this year. I am a famous video game character online.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Energetic and social, loves to stay active and enjoy culinary experiences.
participant_2.background: I have always had long hair. I worked at a movie theater for 4 years. I like spicy food. I enjoy running at night.

content.text: What do you do for fun?
I like to run, watch movies, and eat spicy food.
Oh, cool! I like to run too. I also like to play video games.
What kind of video games do you like to play?
I like to play all kinds of video games, but I especially like playing first-person shooters.
Oh, me too! I love playing Call of Duty and Battlefield.
Me too! I've been playing Call of Duty since the first game came out.
Me too! That game was so much fun.
I know, right? I'm so excited for the new one.
Me too! I've been watching all the trailers and I can't wait to play it.
Me too! It looks like it's going to be a lot of fun.
I know, right? I'm so excited.
Well, it was nice talking to you. I hope we can play video games together sometime.
Me too! I'd love to play video games with you.
